Volunteer Coordinator: Kristin Stratulat, Coordinator of Volunteer Programs and Better at Home; Email: volunteer@seniorsoutreach.ca
Service Details: Enhances the quality of life for seniors in the community by providing various programs and services, such as:- Information and Referral Services: Provides information about community services and resources for seniors- Seniors Coffee Break Groups: Provides drop-in social opportunities; please call before attending - Eldernet Program: Provides one-on-one computer mentoring/training - Better at Home:  provides affordable, non-medical home support services to seniors- Community Volunteer Income Tax Program: Prepares income tax forms for low-income seniors- Seniors Regional Housing Program: Housing Outreach Social Worker provides support and assistance to eligible seniors by assisting individuals to locate or maintain stable and affordable housing
Eligibility: Eligibility criteria differs by program so please call for details
Cost: - Services are free of charge- Donations support the maintenance and expansion of our programs and are gratefully accepted- A tax-deductible receipt can be issued
Meetings: See calendar of events posted on our website
